TopicTitle: Need recruits for a starmade faction (Nextech Enterprises Recruiting)

Articles.Content:
(Please dont kill me mods if this is illegal)

Hi i am making a faction on a starmade server and because of how ridiculously hard it is to get new members i want to see if any of you wanna join the upcoming faction.

Volunteers:

Zednova

Endersmens

Space\_Kraken

Starwhip

Jeremy\_pili

Maybe:

Thomas988 (He will be the co-founder)

Vaporo

The server ip is sm.elwyneternity.com:4242

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-23T08:11:02Z" title="06/23/2015 08:11  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 23, 2015</time> by daniel l.**
I'll join, my usual server is always empty now ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

...whoa.

Well, yeah, I highly doubt I could contribute the necessary time to something like this. It looks amazing, but feels like it would require me to have twice the number of hours in a day than what I have.

My goal is at least 20 people on the faction because on the server im on (elwyneternity) players build really big ships so i'll need a lot of help to be able to face the big fish

- - - Updated - - -

> ...whoa.
> Well, yeah, I highly doubt I could contribute the necessary time to something like this. It looks amazing, but feels like it would require me to have twice the number of hours in a day than what I have.

Hmm are you in?
Starmade looks like a really cool game, but I'm afraid I simply don't have the time nor money to do this.

> 
> Starmade looks like a really cool game, but I'm afraid I simply don't have the time nor money to do this.

I understand time but how does it cost money? you can get the game free on its website.

>

Wait, what?

:facedesk:

I saw a "buy" icon in the corner.... ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Well, perhaps during the summer.

> 
> (Please dont kill me mods if this is illegal)

\*pulls out flamethrower\*

Nah, you're fine.

I'd love to try and get into this, but what with finals and wedding, and life (and my persistent EU4 addiction) I don't think I have the time.

Sorry ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

> 
> I saw a "buy" icon in the corner.... ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Probably one of those games that technically lets you play for free, but if you want to get anywhere above "Level 5" you need to keep shelling out cash. Hopefully I'm wrong about that, but... generally anything that's Free to Play quickly devolves into Pay to Win.

> 
> Probably one of those games that technically lets you play for free, but if you want to get anywhere above "Level 5" you need to keep shelling out cash. Hopefully I'm wrong about that, but... generally anything that's Free to Play quickly devolves into Pay to Win.

do you want to join vger? just wanna know.
Wish I could, but not enough time. At best I'd be casually poking around once a week, probably when everyone else is asleep.

What are the system requirements of the game? how big is the download?

EDIT: Found system requirements on the wiki. But how big is the download?

I downloaded the launcher and clicked update and install. When I exited the game to turn down some graphics, there was no shortcut to the game. Nothing in start menu. Nothing in Program Files. I clicked the launched again and it said it didn't detect an installation...yeah, I'm downloading it off steam now....(also steam says it has a free demo and the game is $9.99)

Steam worked.

Messing around in it. Why do I start losing health when I close in on a planet?? It's so frustrating. I built a ship with cannons and salvage beams and I was wanting to get some raw materials so I could actually do stuff but I can't go anywhere cause planets cause damage.

> 
> Steam worked.
> Messing around in it. Why do I start losing health when I close in on a planet?? It's so frustrating. I built a ship with cannons and salvage beams and I was wanting to get some raw materials so I could actually do stuff but I can't go anywhere cause planets cause damage.

What the... how? you must be at a planet too close to the sun maybe you should settle in a more distant sector.

If I die, does my ship respawn with me? 

I set nav to the farthest planet from a star. If this one causes damage I swear... ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)
Downloading launcher now. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> If I die, does my ship respawn with me? 
> I set nav to the farthest planet from a star. If this one causes damage I swear... ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

When you die your ship doesnt respawn in fact it wont get destroyed unless the core got overheated so if you get back there in time you should be able to get your ship back.
